cambly_20231025.definition: to make a long, high, sad sound
to have a very great success or victory
to burn a surface slightly, causing it to change color
to quickly take something in your hand(s) and hold it firmly
to cause something to move with great force against something hard, usually causing damage or injury
to pull something forcefully with a quick movement
to (cause to) move against a hard surface with force and usually a loud noise
(of land) wild and not even; not easy to travel over
a mountain made from burned materials that may throw out hot rocks and lava (= hot liquid rock) from a hole in its top
(negative) the condition of being alone, especially when this makes you feel unhappy
(positive) the situation of being alone without other people
before a particular time, or before doing a particular thing (as soon as possible)
An uninhabited place has no people living in it

idioms_20231023.definition: If someone betrays something such as a promise, they do not do what they promised
to succeed in achieving two things in a single action
idioms_20231023.word: kill two birds with one stone

idioms_20231023.definition: to continue to have your beliefs or continue with a plan of action, even if other people disagree with you
to have something more important to do
a state in which you are starting an activity or process again, not considering what has happened in the past at all
to want to talk to someone about something annoying they have done
idioms_20231023.word: have a bone to pick with someone

idioms_20231023.definition: to make someone prove that what they are saying is true, or to make someone prove that they will really do what they say, because you do not believe them

idioms_20231023.word: not have a leg to stand on

idioms_20231023.definition: to do something harmful to someone who trusted you, A betrayal of trust, an act of treachery.
Proverb(If you have done something wrong, you will feel better if you confess that you did it)
idioms_20231023.word: confession is good for the soul

synonym_20231109.definition: working or operating in a way that gets the results you want without any waste
causing, or able to cause, damage
to hurt someone or damage something
able to express thoughts and feelings easily and clearly, or showing this quality
to reduce or be reduced in size or importance
showing a clear and usually original understanding of a complicated problem or situation
very good at noticing and understanding things that many people do not notice
(of a person or animal) strong and healthy, or (of an object or system) strong and unlikely to break or fail
to avoid or escape from someone or something
to cause someone to be unable to understand or explain something
to read through something, especially in order to find the part you are interested in
to agree or have the same opinion
